reviews.text: Attended the dance competition )which included STC) the show was enjoyable had a good time. The public on the other should be considerate + not leave all their trash behind.
The shows were great but the participants were forced to use hallways for dressing room. The schedule that was given was never followed and was totally useless.
Love the convention center! Reflection pool is nice, and they host so many events! And if your still playing Pokemon Go then go!

Very disappointed!! Went there for my daughter's dance competition and I guess it's all about the money. It's all business! Pay for this and pay for that, buy this and buy that and spend spend spend so that your child can get a 5 dollar dance jacket. The best way people can get to your hard earned money, is through your kids. And they know it!!
Water was really clean. Kids got exciting see a turtle enjoying a swim. **The simple things**
Bldg.is very nice. The people all were very helpful.
Graphics is doing invitations and really enjoy working with Becky
Great Service!! Highly recommend!!
Dropped by to fax a document and young lady was very helpful. Fast service. Very satisfied.
Everytime I come here it's reliable. I love that the most.
Attended the dance competition )which included STC) the show was enjoyable had a good time. The public on the other should be considerate + not leave all their trash behind.
The shows were great but the participants were forced to use hallways for dressing room. The schedule that was given was never followed and was totally useless.
Love the convention center! Reflection pool is nice, and they host so many events! And if your still playing Pokemon Go then go!

Very disappointed!! Went there for my daughter's dance competition and I guess it's all about the money. It's all business! Pay for this and pay for that, buy this and buy that and spend spend spend so that your child can get a 5 dollar dance jacket. The best way people can get to your hard earned money, is through your kids. And they know it!!
Water was really clean. Kids got exciting see a turtle enjoying a swim. **The simple things**
Attended the dance competition )which included STC) the show was enjoyable had a good time. The public on the other should be considerate + not leave all their trash behind.
The shows were great but the participants were forced to use hallways for dressing room. The schedule that was given was never followed and was totally useless.
Love the convention center! Reflection pool is nice, and they host so many events! And if your still playing Pokemon Go then go!

Pay for this and pay for that, buy this and buy that and spend spend spend so that your child can get a 5 dollar dance jacket. The best way people can get to your hard earned money, is through your kids. And they know it!!
Water was really clean. Kids got exciting see a turtle enjoying a swim. **The simple things**
Great food. Great customer service They always have specials or promotions going on so thats a plus. 😌
They forgot my tortillas. But it was good. Had grilled 2 pc with broccoli and salad for healthy eating, and no tortillas. It worked out.
Love the food here and it's always fast and great for a budget. Some great healthy options too.
The chicken was leather dry. The rice and beans were good, now I know why there were so few customers there.
Great food worth the price and the customer service is pretty good
Love the food. I always get the huevos rancheros and they are awesome!

Great food always hot and fresh and great portion size.  You definitely get alot of food for a good price.  The wait staff is friendly and courteous.  My only complaint is that I wish they were open for dinner ( ha-ha).  Recommend giving the little mom and pop restaurant a chance.  You will not be disappointed and you will become a regular.
BEST PLACE TO EAT
Good food and great service
This is my absolute favorite place to get breakfast tacos!!! I order it every time!!! ❤️ The staff is very friendly and welcoming ☺️

安くて美味しい！
飲み放題付き3,000円のコースは、お料理もいっぱい出てきて、ボリューム満点！
とむや
飲み放題メニューも種類が豊富で、色々なお酒を試せたり、ノンアルメニューも多かったです
辛さも控えめで食べやすいし、テーブルにタバスコのようなソースもあったので、調整もできます
店員さんも感じ良かったです
居酒屋わやわやの姉妹店。熟成白神生ハムを売りにしている。単品699円テーブルサーブだと1000円。国産三元豚使用‼️添加物一切不使用‼️
3,500円のコースでお腹いっぱい食べられます。ただしハイボールは炭酸が抜けた感じでイマイチ

手軽にアジアン料理を食べられるお店です。
メニューが豊富で、何かしら好きなものにありつけます。
パクチー嫌いな人も楽しめます。
ただ、週末は予約しないと入れなさそうです。
飲み放題メニューも多く、料理のコスパも高い。平日の夜でも混んでいました。
Personally I love the place. The food and service is amazing. Whenever I'm in need of something or ask questions, they always respond with a positive attitude.

We ordered at 9:39am and didn’t get our food until 10:10am. We ordered 4 tacos. How is waiting for 30 minutes acceptable for FOUR TACOS? On top of that, one of the tacos orders was missing egg. They refunded the amount for the one incorrect taco and the remaining 3 tacos tasted good. But really? This location is lacking and I’d recommend driving a little further to eat in a more timely manner with better customer service.

Good Restaurant good soulful food to dine with family and friends. I would recomend this restaurant if your pocket money is short you want to save and eat good on a budget this is the place for you. Also all of the workers are kind courteous and considerate of their customers. I would highly recommend this restaurant.
Decent place to eat, tho is relatively close to the border, you’d think it’s “real” Mexican. It’s not. This is more texmex than anything else. Still recommendable

We love the breakfast tacos. They cook the tortillas and make the fillings when you requested. Morning sauce is great. Very good price, Very good tacos and good price.
Also the service is very good.

We have eaten here about a dozen times and it never disappoints.They brew some of their own beer which is delicious, as well as make their own bread. Many vegan options. Great pizza. Love their hummus platters. Reasonably priced. Service always wonderful and pleasant. It's a fun, funky place! Blue Onion is one of our family's top three favorite resturants. The food is consistently fresh and delicious. The portions are generous and prices are good. The atmosphere is pleasant and wait staff is courteous. The flatbread and dips...yum! 😋

Great Prices and Great Food was on point. Service was great and we never felt neglected. The only bad I find which is really another great were the food prices. In all honesty for the quality of food and great portions I think we seriously underpaid... even with a very generous tip. I highly recommend you try this place. It's my new favorite restaurant.
Pizza and the scene at this place is super good. the staff was very friendly and kind. bring your appetite because portions are generous.
One of my fav locations for tasty pizza. Visited on a Thursday. The staff was very kind and attentive. Prices that won't shock you. Food is like a restaurant in Louisville I liked.

Loved it! Clean environment, friendly staff, and a menu of great food. Don't expect the same old stuff here. The culinary arts are in full force. I highly recommend getting the dip sampler. I personally like the roasted pepper hummus, garlic hummus, and goat cheese with roasted garlic. That's right, goat cheese! You can also get a gyro that doesn't taste processed. I think everything is made in-house. It sure tastes like it. Give it a try if you want something that isn't in a tortilla.

There's something for everyone at City Cafe! I love the variety of appetizers and entrees, as well as their selection of beverages. There are areas of the restaurant that are quite chatty, as well as quiet if you're looking for a more intimate conversation. I've never had anything short of excellent customer service. I highly recommend the sangria and Morrocan burger! Very filling and healthy and not greasy at all.

Just awesome!  We had brunch there this morning. Andrew was our server and he was so nice. The angry omelet was very good. And the ambiance was fun, too. The only thing needing improvement was the coffee. Very bitter. Not sure if it was the coffee or the brewing, but something was off.

Went to brunch today with my wife for my birthday.  We have been going to city cafe for years and it’s always been a favorite.  Today was an awful experience.  Our appetizer never came (which we were most looking forward to), and my wife’s food was not only incorrect, but stone cold when it arrived.  My omelet was horribly over cooked.  We usually don’t say anything but today we did, and we got a ‘sorry about that’ from our waiter and that was it.  A $75 bill for inedible food was delivered with no offer of a replacement meal or the appetizer.  Have to say that will unfortunately be our last visit to this place.  We ended up at the owl bar eating pizza...which was fantastic.  Should have went there in the first place.

They forgot to microwave the crab cake enough (ice cold in center, seriously, others felt it and were disgusted) then they brought a "replacement" out on a dirty plate after we all finished our meals. . . 
. . . Regardless, it's a dying neighborhood and they don't care about cutting corners.  Just look at the feedback!  They won't even take a couple minutes to address issues or say thanks.  Just walk another block or two and have an enjoyable meal.

Nice laid back atmosphere. The food is very good and tasty. Service was fast and I did get every one of my requests for my food exactly right as requested.  Extra sauce for my  brussel sprouts and the blackened salmon was crisp  on the outside and tender on the inside. My my my!

It was a great experience on March 20. 2019.Our waiter Frederico made our visit to your restaurant a pleasant one. The choice of foods he recommended was great and his customer service was exceptional.  His knowledge on recommendations were right on especially that mango cheesecake. We loved it. We will visit again and we recommend this place highly.
Very nice place to come to eat lunch.  Love their Enchiladas Plate.  Didn't have to wait long.  Waiter was very nice.  Would recommend this place to my friends and family.

Chips and salsa are of the best. Food is a little pricey, but so far all the dishes I've had have been great. Very impressed with the service. Atmosphere is great, place is clean with a mix of modern and classic Mexican look.

I took my Tia for her birthday, to be completely honest, I was weary of coming here because I’ve never been and it sounds expensive. Anyway, I was reluctant and we went. Apart from waiting about 10 minutes at lunch time to be seated the experience we had there was awesome. The waiter was great, he made sure our drinks were full all the time without being in our way, got our orders all correct, and had a smile on his face the whole time. The food was great, serving portions were generous, and they even sung Happy Birthday to my Tia Panchita.

The Chicken Strips, the fish and the Fry's were amazing. They served the food fast and lots of shrimp. "Good" there not stingy with there food like other restaurants. And the place felt like nice original ocean spot.

Food was great. Pricing not bad.
Service very good. My wife and I enjoyed all plus the setting. 
Highly recommend!

I love the atmosphere, the servers are awesome, and the prices are typical for this sort of place. The Shrimp Tiko was okay with the addition of salt & pepper. Blackened shrimp and a splash of heavy cream would've made it something special to write home about. 🙂 Lots more items on the menu to try so will def be going back.

Had the chicken Montego. The pasta + sauce was so bland, not even salt and pepper could save it. The chicken tasted like the bland, chicken patty "product" you get with hospital food. Nothing in this dish was fresh or tasty.
Amazing dining experience! The food was fresh and prepared extremely well! Can't wait to go again.

Now this place closed down for a few years and man was I bummed.  Different location.  The calamari costner was my favorite.  When I heard they came back I knew I had to see if the recipe changed.  Nope.  So good. They have other good items but I can't be a testimony to the other items.  This is the only pasta I'll get.  It's ridiculously delicious to me.  And I like it spiced up. Highly recommend.

Loved all of the accompanying dishes so you can create your own flavor combos. We got there just in time, around 6:30 before the mobs of people started to arrive around 7. The service was terrific, fast, warm smiles and the staff all had a collective effort. Be sure to say hi to the owner/host, he was the nicest guy and you can tell he took pride in his restaurant. We’ll definitely be back, but next time we’re trying the bbq table :) 

Also - be sure to get the chicken dumplings to start

It was good but I wouldn't say that it was stellar and I would come back. The food was average and the place is definitely historic. They need to up their game given there are many other fantastic korean good food options in Austin now. The place is a little hard to find as it is tucked away near a small Chinese Zen garden. The service was okay and took a while. We requested a few things but didn't get it on time. We had to ask the waiter multiple times. The interior was a little dim and bland. The tofu soup was really great though, not so sure about the cold noodles. It is worth a one time try but I can't fully recommend it as a too option, there are a lot other better ones.
We got Korean BBQ combo and everything was amazing! Great atmosphere, very helpful staff. Loved it!!
Have been coming here for ten years plus. Never a bad experience! Great atmosphere, and wonderful people.

Always great. They have cleaned, updated and renovated the place. They also performed a menu update after the previous owner, who was also the sushi chef, retired. No more sushi is a bummer. Also, my favorite dish consisting of stir fried baby octopus is gone. I was initially sad that my favorite dish was gone but it forced me to try something new and I was not let down! They were busy for lunch and all the diners seemed content. I will always come back.
One of my favorite places for authentic Mexican food!

Husbands torta was great. My enchiladas tasted a little off but rice and beans were good.  Queso wasn't very good.  Service was awesome and food came out quick. In general a great little place,  will try something different next time.
Great homemade food, friendly service, one of the best Micheladas.
For right now I'm giving 4 out of 5 only because it was my first time and had the carnitas taco combo, Yummy. I'm looking forward to many return visits. Great service as well.
Authentic, fresh, affordable simple Mexican cuisine!

I’m in town on business and stopped in for lunch. I’ve been once years before. I admit I left with the same feeling as last time. It was good, but I’m not sure why there is such a hype about the food. It was good, but not exceptional. My service was fine. The waitress wasn’t very personable, but was efficient. I had a combination of one chicken, one steak, and one shrimp taco. They were all pretty good. They shrimp was diced up and overpowered by the sauce it was in. I also had the tortilla soup and it WAS fantastic. I would definitely order it again should I happen to go back.

I came here for a conference and was brought here to eat.  What a fantastic place.  Food.  Music.  A wonderful singer!  Did I mention the food?  Food was fantastic!  The wait staff was wonderful.  And great mixed drinks 👌😁!  Maybe I'll move down here so I can eat here once a week. Thank you for having me!
Very good food. Cocktails made well. Everything tasted very fresh. Great service.  Good prices.
Mexican food at this spot - super good. I will be back with my friends. The bill was fair I would say. I can see why they have so many good reviews.

The waiter didn't even know what beers they had. The free tortilla chips with refried beans was odd. The bean soup was actually pretty good. The appetizer wasn't very good and there were avocado peel/skins in the guacamole. The enchiladas were awful. It just didn't taste good. The atmosphere is wide open and reminds me of a cafeteria.i wouldn't recommend it.
This might be the best restaurant I have ever been to. The avocado chicken is awesome and the fajita pizza (which isn't officially on the on the menu) is AMAZING! Great food and great atmosphere!

The food is delicious! Try the avocado chicken. If you like sweet drinks, try the Peach Blossom. The Santa Fe drink is best for a spicier palette. Best day to visit is on Saturday nights with live music on the patio.
Mexican food and the feeling here is super good. Loved this place from the first taste. The staff was very welcoming and sociable. Prices are reasonable I would say.

This place is very charming. From the road you can not tell it has a beautiful out door dinning area with a fountain and plenty of plants that surround the area. The out door dinning is under a roof and they have live entertainment. We ate inside which is also very nice. The menu has plenty of options. We have 4 diffent entrees and they all were terrific. The wait staff was very friendly. I will deffinetly visit this place when I return. On the back of the menu is a story of the republic of the Rio Grande. If you stop in, be sure to read it.
Outstanding place for tasty Mexican food. The service was very friendly and kind. This place has an awesome feel to it. This place has many reviews for a reason.

What makes this one string of butterfly to move in circle? There is no air blowing! Position yourself straight down under....You'll see what I mean. McAllen seems a big city compared to it's size of airport. The city is beautiful and has so much to offer. Full of history, architectural designs, protected nature areas, rich culture, and so many festivities with local artists. Either, there is not enough people in and out of town or people use other ways to travel.

Fantastic airport to fly from.  Small, quick lines. Efficient planes taking off and landing.  With Non-stop flights to Houston, Dallas, Las Vegas, Orlando and Mexico City there is plenty of options to either fly for the weekend or connect to a mayor hub. Friendly staff, inexpensive parking, clean restrooms, comfy seats at gates a restaurant and a bar... Super service all around!!!

Small airport with only a few airlines. The place is well organized, easy to get around as it's so small, there's a coffee shop and souvenir store before you check in and after you can find another store with some snacks.
Nice ckean small,  quick to get through security. Great cheap flights from allegiant, just dont carry too much luggage-allegiant air  charges alot.
Very nice Airport always clean. You can get in and out quickly.

Very classy and enjoyable experience.  Very enlightening conversations with the servers. Qua a server there provided the perfect measure of hospitality and professionalism.  My wife and I will be looking forward to our next night out. Thank you...

Went to visit a friend and decided to go to the “nicest” place in McAllen.
We ordered the fillet with lobster.
The lobster was good but both of our steaks were definitely not what we expected. One steak was undercooked and one was over cooked I’m not sure how that happened. 
The asparagus tasted crunchy like it was topped with cheese and tossed in the microwave. The place is definitely nice and welcoming but I had high expectations for such a top dollar place.

Where to start. Absolutely amazing place. Live in Kentucky we eat great steak and drink great bourbon this place hit both nails on the head. Service was amazing. Food and drinks are pricey but priced right for atmosphere and service. Best old fashion I’d had. Food was amazing. I cannot say enough great things. Absolutely 5/5. Live music was perfect along with atmosphere.

Went there on April 9 for our 43 anniversary  my wife and I ordered the spinach dip  then the ribeye steak.  Was cooked perfectly. We finished the meal with a Spanish coffee and cheesecake  everything was delicious. One question though. On the your website it shows the steak with a salad.  No salad was served.  We were  too full to even notice until after we had left.  Kinda pricey but worth every cent..

I had never had the pleasure of going to Santa Fe until last week.  From all the good I've heard, I was not disappointed.   The food was great, the drinks were good, and steaks cooked to perfection.  

However,  the service was pretty horrible.  Our server was nice, but not on point.  Drinks took bout 30 minutes to get after ordered.  In addition, when the food arrived (which I'm not sure if this is  normal)  it stood on trays for about 10 minutes while our server disappeared.   

Then other servers would come look at the food, then the order notepad,  and I'm guessing they couldn't figure out who's was who's.   I get it, they don't want to go around asking who had what...  because it's a fancy place.  But the food sat there for a good while.  

Anyway, maybe it just wasn't that servers night.  I'll go again when I don't feel like cooking my own steak.

Elegant ambiance, live guitarist provided background music. Food was delicious, and well prepared and presented. Waiter and staff were attentive. Highly recommend. Would like to return and sit on patio, just too chilly that night so it wasn't open. There were a couple of corporate dinner parties, and one large "baby shower" which was fine, it added to the air of celebration!

If you are looking for a romantic atmosphere or trying to impress that love of your life....this is the place or if you just feel like having an amazing meal, this is the place. Food,service, ambiance....amazing. This is a must. If you love wine they have basic wines starting from 8 or 16 dollars a glass and up to 6000 dollars bottles. Truly the best, we will be back.

Love visiting here. Food is phenomenal. Can't go wrong with anything on the menu. Service is the best. The historical significance of the building being in the owners family adds to the ambiance. There is a private room available for gatherings or meetings.

We dined here Monday night. It was not busy. We were greeted immediately and shown to our table and drink orders taken right after seating. The service was impeccable. We started with appetizers of ceviche and lamb chop lollipops. Both were very good. Our 4 main courses were chicken Alfredo, sea bass, pork chop and a shrimp dish. All thought the food was excellent. The service was also excellent. Great atmosphere, but will have to come back on a Thursday or Friday evening to truly judge the night life. The bar was well stocked and had several specialty drinks. A good place for dinner and drinks.
Fantastic food. Pricy but great for a special occasion or treat. Happy hour half price on some drinks and appetizers. The crab tower was wonderful. The sea bass and salmon excellent.
